author: Nuno Aguiar

scripts.postinstall: fixSheBang(outputPath + '/connectTunnels.js'); log('=== Please edit ' + outputPath + '/tunnels.yaml to configure for your needs.'); log('=== Execute "opack exec Tunnels" to startup your tunnels.'); log('=== You can also add more files in the same folder and execute "opack exec Tunnels client1.yaml"');

description: Set a configuration file to automatically connect reusable SSH tunnels (port forwarding) whenever you need them.
name: Tunnels
